description: Microsoft.AgFoodPlatform diagnostic log export, LogAnalytics tables

tables.name: AgriFoodFarmManagementLogs
tables.description: Logs for create, update, delete and get operations on FarmBeats resources such as Farmer, Farm, Field, Boundary, Seasonal Field, Crop, CropVariety, Season, Attachment, Prescription Maps, Prescriptions, Management Zones, Zones, Plant Tissue Analysis, Nutrient Analysis etc.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (in UTC) when the log was created.

columns.name: Category
columns.description: Logs generated as a result of operations executed using FarmBeats APIs are grouped into categories. Categories in FarmBeats are logical groupings based on either the data source the underlying APIs fetch data from or on the basis of hierarchy of entities in FarmBeats.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The operation name for which the log entry was created.

columns.name: RequestUri
columns.description: URI of the API request.

columns.name: FarmerId
columns.description: Farmer ID associated with the request, wherever applicable.

columns.name: DataPlaneResourceId
columns.description: ID that uniquely identifies a FarmBeats resource such as a Farm, Farmer, Boundary etc.

columns.name: CallerIpAddress
columns.description: IP address of the client that made the request.

columns.name: Level
columns.description: The severity level of the event, will be one of Informational, Warning, Error, or Critical.

columns.name: ResultSignature
columns.description: HTTP status of API request.

columns.name: ResultType
columns.description: Result of the REST API request.

columns.name: ResultDescription
columns.description: Additional details about the result, when available.

columns.name: Location
columns.description: The region of the resource emitting the event.

columns.name: CorrelationId
columns.description: Unique identifier to be used to correlate logs, when available.

columns.name: DurationMs
columns.description: Time it took to service the REST API request, in milliseconds.

columns.name: ApplicationId
columns.description: ApplicationId in identity claims.

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: ObjectId in identity claims.

columns.name: ClientTenantId
columns.description: TenantId in identity claims.

columns.name: RequestBody
columns.description: Request body of the API calls.

tables.name: AgriFoodJobProcessedLogs
tables.description: Logs indicating success or failure of job runs for farmOperationDataIngestionJob, farmOperationPeriodicJob, farmOperationEventHandlingJob,satelliteDataIngestionJob, weatherDataIngestionJob etc. These logs also contain reasons for failure of these jobs if any.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp (in UTC) when the log was created.

columns.name: Category
columns.description: Logs generated as a result of operations executed using FarmBeats APIs are grouped into categories. Categories in FarmBeats are logical groupings based on either the data source the underlying APIs fetch data from or on the basis of hierarchy of entities in FarmBeats.

columns.name: OperationName
columns.description: The operation name for which the log entry was created.

columns.name: JobId
columns.description: User defined ID of the job.

columns.name: FarmerId
columns.description: Farmer ID associated with the request, wherever applicable.

columns.name: JobRunType
columns.description: Indicates whether a job is a periodic job or a one-time job.

columns.name: InitiatedBy
columns.description: Indicates whether the job was initiated by FarmBeats or user.

columns.name: Level
columns.description: The severity level of the event, will be one of Informational, Warning, Error, or Critical.

columns.name: ResultType
columns.description: Result of the REST API request.

columns.name: ResultDescription
columns.description: Additional details about the result, when available.

columns.name: Location
columns.description: The region of the resource emitting the event.

columns.name: CorrelationId
columns.description: Unique identifier to be used to correlate logs, when available.

columns.name: DurationMs
columns.description: Time it took to service the REST API request, in milliseconds.

columns.name: ApplicationId
columns.description: ApplicationId in identity claims.

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: ObjectId in identity claims.

columns.name: ClientTenantId
columns.description: TenantId in identity claims.

columns.name: Properties
columns.description: Additional properties associated with the Job.

queries.displayName: Status of farm management operations for a farmer
queries.description: Retrieves logs indicating the status (success or failure) for operations performed in the FarmManagement logs category for a farmer.

queries.displayName: Job execution statistics for a farmer
queries.description: Retrieves the status of job processing for a farmer.
Identifies a list of users who failed to access your resource and the reason for this failure.

queries.displayName: Status of all operations for a farmer
queries.description: Aggregates failures and successes across categories for a farmer.

queries.displayName: Usage trend for top 100 farmers based on the operations performed
queries.description: Retrieves a list of top 100 farmers based on the number of hits received across categories.
